title: Apple Pie Cupcakes
directions: Pour all ingredients except pie filling into a large bowl and beat on low speed for thirty seconds, then medium speed for two minutes.
Fill cupcake liners about 2/3 full with batter.
Coarsely chop apple pie filling so you have chunks rather than slices.
Top batter with a spoonful of apple pie filling.
Bake in a preheated, 325 degree oven for 17-19 minutes.
Allow to cool completely, then frost with Cinnamon Cream Cheese Icing
ingredients: 1 container apple flavored light Yoplait yogurt
